summary: This is an email chain between US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) staff forwarding legal briefs and affidavits related to the case 'Times v BOP' (likely The New York Times vs. Bureau of Prisons). The correspondence indicates the transfer of court filings including government briefs and supplemental declarations.
keyFacts: Email correspondence involves US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) staff.
Documents being forwarded relate to legal case 'Times v BOP' (20cv833), suggesting litigation between The New York Times and the Bureau of Prisons.
Attachments include government briefs, reply briefs, and multiple supplemental declarations.
The email mentions that a transcript will be sent separately when available.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text excerpt; all references are to institutional email addresses.
